on_entry: /execute @s[tag=!母体,tag=!大母体] ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§4"},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" 被感染"}]}
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,tag=母体] ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§4"},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" 被选为母体"}]}
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,tag=大母体] ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§4"},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" 被选为特殊母体"}]}
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,tag=!母体,tag=!大母体] ~~~ playsound human_infect @a
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_1 忆知艾郎得晓愣沉
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=绿画娜] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_2 绿画娜
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=飙啼菌] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_3 飙啼菌
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=普罗陀] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_4 普罗陀
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=狼掏谜纸] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_5 狼掏谜纸
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=鸡姬] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_6 鸡姬
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=禽疯] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_7 禽疯
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=佬僵] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_8 佬僵
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=集锋迫小] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_9 集锋迫小
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=瘤皇蒜黄] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_10 瘤皇蒜黄
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=水药] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_11 水药
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=麟蔑] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_12 麟蔑
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=碍登] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_13 碍登
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=牛腩面面] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_14 牛腩面面
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,name=蚕币] ~~~ summon coldsink:dead_human_ai ~~~ skin_15 蚕币
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai] ~~~ scoreboard players operation @e[type=coldsink:dead_human_ai,c=1] game_score = @s game_score
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai] ~~~ tag @e[type=coldsink:dead_human_ai,tag=!游戏中,c=1] add 游戏中
/execute @s[type=coldsink:human_ai,tag=大母体] ~~~ tag @e[type=coldsink:dead_human_ai,c=1] add 大母体
/event entity @s[type=coldsink:human_ai] godie
